dict.acceptation: 意味着；产生…结果；打算；导致；
吝啬的；刻薄的；破旧的；残忍的；
平均数；中间；几何平均；等比中数；

sent.orig: Auntie, I know now it was mean, but I didn't mean to be mean.
sent.trans: 阿姨，现在我明白那是下流的，可是我本来没打算干那种事。

sent.orig: You mean to tell me, Katie Scarlett O'Hara, that land doesn't mean anything to you?
sent.trans: 你是说，斯佳丽，你不爱惜你的田地吗？

sent.orig: Results Mean age was 51,and mean SBP and DBP were 120.21mmHg(15.99kPa) and 79.89mmHg(10.63kPa).
sent.trans: 结果该人群平均年龄51岁，平均收缩压(SBP)与舒张压(DBP)分别为120.21mmHg(15.99kPa),79.89mmHg(10.63kPa)。

sent.orig: Failure doesn't mean you should give up, it does mean it a little longer.
sent.trans: 失败并不意味着上帝已经放弃了你，而是意味着他有了更好的想法。

sent.orig: He didn't mean to be rude and certainly he didn't mean to offend you.
sent.trans: 他决无恶意，当然无意冒犯你。
